name: Storm night (at the forest)
description:
(this game is incomplete, but felt submitting it anyways was the right choice)

Story/objective: the objective is to keep the fire alive with leaves, wood and even fuel, trying to keep the terrors of night away. To make things worse, there is a storm coming, so you must not only survive the night, but also keep feeding the fire faster and faster.

Controls: move with arrows (or WASD), space to feed the fire with the fuel.
Full-screen recommended.

Bugs and limitations: 
-- Gameplay: The game at the moment lacks a lose condition (monsters just scare the crap out of you, but dont kill you), there is no reset, and when the day arrives, the game does not end.
-- Visuals: i barely designed the level assets, the characters have no animations
